problem_names:
lemma asimp_pretty:
"asimp (Less r cs) =
 (if \<forall>c\<in> set cs. c = 0
  then if r<0 then TrueF else FalseF
  else Atom(Less r cs))"
"asimp (Eq r cs) =
 (if \<forall>c\<in> set cs. c = 0
  then if r=0 then TrueF else FalseF
  else Atom(Eq r cs))"
lemma I_asimp: "R.I (asimp a) xs = I\<^sub>R a xs"
lemma I_qe_FMo\<^sub>1: "R.I (qe_FMo\<^sub>1 as) xs = R.I (qe_FM\<^sub>1 as) xs"
translations:
lemma asimp_pretty:
"asimp (Less r cs) =
 (if \<forall>c\<in> set cs. c = 0
  then if r<0 then TrueF else FalseF
  else Atom(Less r cs))"
"asimp (Eq r cs) =
 (if \<forall>c\<in> set cs. c = 0
  then if r=0 then TrueF else FalseF
  else Atom(Eq r cs))"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. asimp (Less r cs) =
    (if \<forall>c\<in>set cs. c = 0 then if r < 0 then TrueF else FalseF
     else Atom (Less r cs)) &&&
    asimp (Eq r cs) =
    (if \<forall>c\<in>set cs. c = 0 then if r = 0 then TrueF else FalseF
     else Atom (Eq r cs))

definition qe_FMo\<^sub>1 :: "atom list \<Rightarrow> atom fm" where
"qe_FMo\<^sub>1 as = list_conj [asimp(combine p q). p\<leftarrow>lbounds as, q\<leftarrow>ubounds as]"
lemma I_asimp: "R.I (asimp a) xs = I\<^sub>R a xs"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. R.I (asimp a) xs = I\<^sub>R a xs
lemma I_qe_FMo\<^sub>1: "R.I (qe_FMo\<^sub>1 as) xs = R.I (qe_FM\<^sub>1 as) xs"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. R.I (qe_FMo\<^sub>1 as) xs = R.I (qe_FM\<^sub>1 as) xs

by(auto simp:qe_FM\<^sub>1_def qe_FMo\<^sub>1_def asimp_def intro!:qfree_list_conj
        split:atom.split)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. R.I (qe_FMo \<phi>) xs = R.I \<phi> xs

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. R.I (R\<^sub>e.lift_dnfeq_qe qe_FMo\<^sub>1 \<phi>) xs = R.I \<phi> xs

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>as.
       \<forall>a\<in>set as. depends\<^sub>R a \<Longrightarrow>
       qfree (qe_FMo\<^sub>1 as)
 2. \<And>as.
       \<forall>a\<in>set as.
          depends\<^sub>R a \<and>
          \<not> (case a of Less real list \<Rightarrow> False
                  | Eq x [] \<Rightarrow> False
                  | Eq x (c # xa) \<Rightarrow>
                      c \<noteq> 0) \<Longrightarrow>
       R.is_dnf_qe qe_FMo\<^sub>1 as

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>as.
       \<forall>a\<in>set as.
          depends\<^sub>R a \<and>
          \<not> (case a of Less real list \<Rightarrow> False
                  | Eq x [] \<Rightarrow> False
                  | Eq x (c # xa) \<Rightarrow>
                      c \<noteq> 0) \<Longrightarrow>
       R.is_dnf_qe qe_FMo\<^sub>1 as

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>as xs.
       \<forall>a\<in>set as.
          depends\<^sub>R a \<and>
          \<not> (case a of Less real list \<Rightarrow> False
                  | Eq x [] \<Rightarrow> False
                  | Eq x (c # xa) \<Rightarrow>
                      c \<noteq> 0) \<Longrightarrow>
       R.I (qe_FMo\<^sub>1 as) xs =
       (\<exists>x. \<forall>a\<in>set as. I\<^sub>R a (x # xs))

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>as xs.
       \<forall>a\<in>set as.
          depends\<^sub>R a \<and>
          \<not> (case a of Less real list \<Rightarrow> False
                  | Eq x [] \<Rightarrow> False
                  | Eq x (c # xa) \<Rightarrow>
                      c \<noteq> 0) \<Longrightarrow>
       R.I (qe_FM\<^sub>1 as) xs =
       (\<exists>x. \<forall>a\<in>set as. I\<^sub>R a (x # xs))

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>as xs.
       \<forall>a\<in>set as.
          depends\<^sub>R a \<and>
          \<not> (case a of Less real list \<Rightarrow> False
                  | Eq x [] \<Rightarrow> False
                  | Eq x (c # xa) \<Rightarrow>
                      c \<noteq> 0) \<Longrightarrow>
       \<forall>a\<in>set as. is_Less a
 2. \<And>as xs.
       \<forall>a\<in>set as.
          depends\<^sub>R a \<and>
          \<not> (case a of Less real list \<Rightarrow> False
                  | Eq x [] \<Rightarrow> False
                  | Eq x (c # xa) \<Rightarrow>
                      c \<noteq> 0) \<Longrightarrow>
       \<forall>a\<in>set as. depends\<^sub>R a

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>as xs.
       \<forall>a\<in>set as.
          depends\<^sub>R a \<and>
          \<not> (case a of Less real list \<Rightarrow> False
                  | Eq x [] \<Rightarrow> False
                  | Eq x (c # xa) \<Rightarrow>
                      c \<noteq> 0) \<Longrightarrow>
       \<forall>a\<in>set as. depends\<^sub>R a
 2. \<And>as xs.
       \<forall>a\<in>set as.
          depends\<^sub>R a \<and>
          \<not> (case a of Less real list \<Rightarrow> False
                  | Eq x [] \<Rightarrow> False
                  | Eq x (c # xa) \<Rightarrow>
                      c \<noteq> 0) \<Longrightarrow>
       \<forall>a\<in>set as. is_Less a

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>as xs.
       \<forall>a\<in>set as.
          depends\<^sub>R a \<and>
          \<not> (case a of Less real list \<Rightarrow> False
                  | Eq x [] \<Rightarrow> False
                  | Eq x (c # xa) \<Rightarrow>
                      c \<noteq> 0) \<Longrightarrow>
       \<forall>a\<in>set as. is_Less a

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>as xs a.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>a\<in>set as.
                   depends\<^sub>R a \<and>
                   \<not> (case a of Less real list \<Rightarrow> False
                           | Eq x [] \<Rightarrow> False
                           | Eq x (c # xa) \<Rightarrow> c \<noteq> 0);
        a \<in> set as\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> is_Less a

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>as xs a. a \<in> set as \<Longrightarrow> a \<in> set as
 2. \<And>as xs a.
       \<lbrakk>a \<in> set as;
        depends\<^sub>R a \<and>
        \<not> (case a of Less real list \<Rightarrow> False
                | Eq x [] \<Rightarrow> False
                | Eq x (c # xa) \<Rightarrow> c \<noteq> 0)\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> is_Less a

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>as xs a.
       \<lbrakk>a \<in> set as;
        depends\<^sub>R a \<and>
        \<not> (case a of Less real list \<Rightarrow> False
                | Eq x [] \<Rightarrow> False
                | Eq x (c # xa) \<Rightarrow> c \<noteq> 0)\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> is_Less a
